name: Charlie’s Angels: The Game
description:
Good morning, Angels! Ready for your mission?

Protect society in the first ever Charlie’s Angels action runner game!
Don’t judge a girl by her cover. Join the elite network of fearless Charlie’s Angels agents!

The Townsend Agency - a global network of fierce female spies - is recruiting you to save the world. Play as the agent girls of your choice and put your battle skills to use. Select your weapon, dodge cars, run, jump, ride and take down enemies in this action packed game.

CHARLIE’S ANGELS FEATURES:

> Become a global agent, gear up, run fast and show the bad guys who’s boss.
> Pick your Angel and get ready for your mission.
> Infinite runner - the only thing that’ll stop your run is if you make a misstep and trip up!
> Collect coins and gems as you run and jump, fight, and level-up!
> Super-cool power-ups like helicopter rides, coin magnets and shields.
> Unlock special skills: triple jump, glide, dash, and more.

The further you go, the harder it gets. How far can you make it?
